name: Twitter Timeline
description: Automatically add a twitter timeline to any theme.

element_id.label: Element ID
element_id.info: Enter the ID of the HTML element you want your timeline appended to. If you leave this blank it will be appended to the bottom of the window.

width.label: Width
width.info: Enter the width you would like your timeline to be. If left blank it will default to the width of the element.

height.label: Height
height.info: Enter the height you would like your timeline to be. If left blank it will default to the height of the element.

footer.label: Footer
footer.info: Enter a string that you would like placed into the footer of the timeline. This will not be displayed if you turn minimal on.

loop.label: Loop
loop.info: If you would like your tweets to cycle

live.label: Live
live.info: If you would like your timeline to update while users are on the page

exclude_replies.label: Exclude replies
exclude_replies.info: Excludes @replies from appearing in your timeline

minimal.label: Minimal
minimal.info: Removes the header, footer, and user information for a cleaner, more minimalistic timeline

theme.label: Theme
theme.info: Enter a valid theme object to customize the appearance of your timeline. This must be a valid javascript object or it will be ignored.
